abstract: Big Ten conference moves to lower maximum age for incoming freshmen on college hockey teams by one year to reduce number of older, more developed players on teams; Many coaches object to proposal, saying it would deprive them of edge against powerhouse teams.
lead_paragraph: A proposal to lower the age limit of incoming freshmen by one year, to 20, has agitated the hockey community, pitting a number of traditional powers against many smaller programs.

headline.main: Big Ten’s Freshman Proposal Splits Universities
headline.print_headline: Big Ten’s Freshman Proposal Splits Universities

snippet: A proposal to lower the age limit of incoming freshmen by one year, to 20, has agitated the hockey community, pitting a number of traditional powers against many smaller programs.
